Waydroid.description: A robot originally designed for navigation guidance, now wandering the wasteland.
Waydroid.description_ko: 길안내용으로 제작된 로봇. 이제는 황야를 배회한다.

Booster Bot.description: A support robot that enhances other robots.

Chaingun Champion.description: A powerful combat robot equipped with a chaingun.

Decarbonizer.description: A robot designed to disintegrate carbon-based lifeforms.
Decarbonizer.description_ko: 탄소 기반 생명체를 분해하도록 설계된 로봇.

Leering Stalker.description: A dangerous mechanical creature that stalks its prey.

Chrome Pyramid.description: A metallic pyramid-shaped guardian created with ancient technology.
Chrome Pyramid.description_ko: 고대 기술로 만들어진 금속 피라미드 형태의 수호자.

Cherubim.description: An ancient guardian robot in the form of an angel.
